name: Super Ordinary Brothers
description:
A run-and-gun platformer made in less than 12 hours for the 41th GMC Jam! The theme was "a big mistake", and let's just say you're probably gonna make a big mistake in this game.

I mean, you've already made a big mistake coming to this page in the first place, but whatever.

Collect coins, buy guns, shoot the 1 type of enemy that's added into the game, and try to make it through all 15 levels before you're bored to sleep!

There's a twist, though - if you die, you're dead for real.
